attributes.action: Ban trolleys from using specified pram and wheelchair spaces on public transport
attributes.additional_details: I want trolleys to be banned from taking up pram and wheelchair spaces on public transport due to the community being unable to use those specified spaces for those needs.
attributes.background: Ban trolleys from taking up priority spaces from prams and wheelchair users

rejection.details:
Wheelchair users have priority over space allocated for wheelchair users as it is the only place they can travel safely.

Decisions about how this space can be used by other passengers are a matter for individual bus operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
